title: Who should do the actual slaughtering? (Udhiya/Qurbani) | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: alhamdulillah who is more recommended to do the actual slaughtering well the sunnah is for you to do the slaughtering with your own hand if you have knowledge in it if you're going to torture your odhey no please stay away from it but if you have a strong heart and you know how to do it then go ahead and do the slaughtering your self
